description: The Nordic explorer who made Greenland a Danish colony is a divisive figure.
title: Hans Egede: Greenland votes on colonial Danish statue
title_page: Hans Egede: Greenland votes on colonial Danish statue - BBC News
maintext: The Nuuk administration says that so far there are 555 votes in favour of keeping the statue in place at Kolonihavnen, and 324 votes to remove it. The vote, online and by post, runs from 3 to 21 July.
